body.name: Bevel Face & Beard Wash with Witch Hazel and Aloe Vera to Cleanse, Hydrate and Brighten Skin, 4 Fl Oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 21 hrs 20 mins
features: Powerful Cleansing and Hydration - Bevel Face & Beard Wash is infused with Tea Tree Oil, Witch Hazel, and Aloe Vera to effectively cleanse and hydrate your skin, leaving it refreshed and rejuvenated.
Brighten Your Complexion - Our face & beard wash contains Vitamin B3, which helps to brighten your skin tone and reduce the appearance of dark spots, giving you a radiant and even complexion.

Gentle Formula for Men - Designed specifically for men's skin, our face & beard wash is gentle yet effective, removing dirt, oil, and impurities without stripping away the skin's natural moisture barrier.
Combat Acne and Breakouts - With the powerful combination of Tea Tree Oil and Witch Hazel, our face & beard wash helps to combat acne, reduce inflammation, and prevent future breakouts.

Suitable for All Skin Types - Whether you have dry, oily, or sensitive skin, our Bevel Face & Beard Wash is suitable for all skin types. Experience a refreshing cleanse and enjoy the benefits of a healthier, clearer complexion.
body.description: A gentle AM/PM face & beard cleanser sensitive enough for even the most troubled skin. Witch Hazel and Coconut Water soothe and hydrate while gently clearing pores to prime skin for shaving and hydration. Niacin amide helps even skin tone and improve texture.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Bevel Difference Designed to help prevent razor bumps, and irritation for smoother, softer skin. Locks in moisture and restores hair strength without stripping hair of its natural oils. Helps improve your skin’s ability to hold moisture to stay fresh and moisturized all day. Moisturizes hair to help strengthen, nourish, and reduce breakage for a fuller beard.

Face Wash Toner Pads Face Gel Spot Fader Skin Essentials Kit Cleanses and revitalizes dull skin without drying it out ✓ ✓ Exfoliates to reduce the appearance and occurrence of dark spots and ingrowns ✓ ✓ Instantly hydrates to help restore and balance skin ✓ ✓ Helps reduce appearance of early-stage bumps in one potent drop ✓ For all skin types ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ No Parabens or Artificial Fragrances ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Face and Beard Wash
reviews.reviewText: Bevel Face and Beard Wash is a fantastic addition to any man's grooming routine. As a user of this product, I can confidently say that it delivers on its promises and provides a refreshing and effective cleansing experience for both the face and beard.One of the standout features of Bevel Face and Beard Wash is its gentle yet thorough cleaning action. The formula is designed to remove dirt, oil, and impurities without stripping the skin and hair of essential moisture. This is particularly important for those with sensitive or easily irritated skin, and I found that it left my face feeling clean and refreshed without any dryness or tightness.Moreover, the product is enriched with natural ingredients, such as aloe vera and coconut-derived cleansers, which contribute to its soothing and hydrating properties. The subtle, masculine scent is also a nice touch, providing a pleasant and invigorating aroma without being overpowering.In terms of beard care, Bevel Face and Beard Wash does an excellent job of cleansing and softening facial hair, making it easier to manage and style. It lathers up nicely, allowing for a thorough and enjoyable washing experience.The packaging is sleek and practical, and the product itself is easy to dispense and use. Additionally, Bevel's commitment to providing high-quality grooming solutions for men, particularly those with coarse or curly hair, is evident in the thoughtfulness and effectiveness of this face and beard wash.Overall, I highly recommend Bevel Face and Beard Wash to anyone in search of a premium grooming product that effectively cleanses and nourishes both the face and beard. It's a great addition to any man's daily grooming routine and offers excellent value for the quality it delivers.

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars cleans but weird smell
reviews.reviewText: Definitely cleanse the skin but it strangely smells like a bowl of Fruity Pebbles cereal. Was expecting a manly smell.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My husband loves it!
reviews.reviewText: I got him this for Christmas and it keeps his frizzy beard in shape here in humid Florida. He also has dry skin under his beard and this helps! He loves itHe uses this, the conditioner and pomade

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’m a fan
reviews.reviewText: Didn’t used Bevel before but I was introduced from a gift I received. This face wash provides me a glow I didn’t have before and goes well with the face gel. Try it!!!

reviews.reviewText: Works great and gets rid of any oils your body has expelled while also moisturizing, healing, and soothing your face skin! Will continue to purchase!!!
